title: Learning Curve
description: Dinner with a dominant millionaire...Nell has enjoyed a mind-blowing afternoon of hedonistic discovery in Marc Cassidy’s office. The heir to the Cassidy Corporation is nothing like the irresponsible, cocksure type she imagined, and what’s more, he’s got his sights set on more than just one office tryst. They have a dinner date, and she’s out of her depth...Skipping dessert...Nell can’t be sure of much where Marc is concerned, but she knows one thing – he wants her. Not just in his bed, but in his private dungeon. She’s a newbie to all things kinky, but she can’t deny that her submissive streak runs deeper than she ever knew. Can she bear the pain side of BDSM, or will she safeword out of the scene before their relationship can reach new heights – subspace and beyond?
author: Amy Valenti
